name: Element AI Inc
description: Developer of AI software designed to offer deep domain expertise and access to cutting-edge technology. The company's software operationalize and create business impact with a suite of products, services and tools which redefine peak performance with problem-solving technology that continuously learns and improves, enabling clients to unlock insights, accelerate adoption and allow their employees to make decisions with explainable solutions.
one_liner: Developer of AI software designed to offer deep domain expertise and access to cutting-edge technology. The company's software operationalize and create business impact with a suite of products, services and tools which redefine peak performance with problem-solving technology that continuously learns and improves, enabling clients to unlock insights, accelerate adoption and allow their employees to make decisions with explainable solutions.
